helpItems.title: Search Coaches
helpItems.description: Use the search bar to find coaches by name.

helpItems.title: Filter by Sport
helpItems.description: Filter the coach list by their primary sport.

helpItems.title: Sort Coaches
helpItems.description: Sort coaches by name, sport, or years of experience.

helpItems.title: Change View
helpItems.description: Toggle between list and grid view.

profileSections.defaultBio: Professional coach with expertise in {sport}. Specializing in {specialization}. Passionate about developing athletes to reach their full potential through personalized training and mentorship.
profileSections.defaultPhilosophy: I believe in a holistic approach to training that focuses on technical skill development, physical conditioning, and mental preparation. My coaching methodology emphasizes personalized attention to each athlete's unique needs and talents, fostering an environment of continuous improvement and teamwork.
